## Upcoming Events

* Tue Dec 7th 9am PST. GitHub Actions. Eli will give a brief tutorial and then NMFS R UG members will show how they are using GitHub Actions. [Add the event to your calendar](https://calendar.google.com/event?action=TEMPLATE&tmeid=MHZmM2wxbTJpdTFlc3Zuamc4djZyaDJqMWEgbm9hYS5nb3ZfNjByZm43bWw5cnBjaGw2M3ZzNGFmOW4wMThAZw&tmsrc=noaa.gov_60rfn7ml9rpchl63vs4af9n018%40group.calendar.google.com)
* Tue Dec 14th 9am PST. Kelly Mayo (NMFS Office of Science and Technology) will be giving a 1 hour tutorial and discussion about manually (via Adobe Acrobat) editing reports to be 508 compliant and talk about how we can use screen readers to check our work.  [Add the event to your calendar](https://calendar.google.com/event?action=TEMPLATE&tmeid=MnM0MDFlNG4zZTc5b29iYWtvbjZ2YmU3NHIgbm9hYS5nb3ZfNjByZm43bWw5cnBjaGw2M3ZzNGFmOW4wMThAZw&tmsrc=noaa.gov_60rfn7ml9rpchl63vs4af9n018%40group.calendar.google.com)
